title: Book Appointments Easily with Calencraft | Online Scheduling
description: Calencraft makes booking services a breeze. From beauty treatments to home services, discover easy and quick scheduling for all your needs.

aboutUsPage.welcome: Welcome to Calencraft! I am delighted to introduce this platform, developed with passion and dedication. Calencraft is all about making it easy for you to discover and book a variety of services, from fitness classes to music lessons and much more.
aboutUsPage.goal: My goal with Calencraft is simple: to provide a seamless and enjoyable experience when searching for and booking services. Whether you want to start a new fitness routine or learn a new skill, Calencraft is here to help you find the perfect provider.
aboutUsPage.atCalencraft: At Calencraft, we are driven by a passion to help people like you connect with providers who can meet your needs. Transparency, reliability, and your satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.
aboutUsPage.whosBehindDescription: It’s just me, the sole developer behind Calencraft! I am committed to creating a platform that exceeds your expectations and makes your life easier. From coding to design, I handle everything with care and attention to detail.
aboutUsPage.thankYouDescription: Thank you for choosing Calencraft. I am excited to continue developing and expanding the platform to serve you better!

email_editor.description: Click on the shorthand to substitute it. The system will automatically fill the placeholders with actual data.
email_editor.description_2: For example: In the welcome message, the $user (User) abbreviation will be replaced with the user's name.
email_editor.description_3: Please ensure that the email contains all important information, such as the location of the service, the time, and the service itself.

editor.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this item: {{item}}?
editor.fixed_time: Fixed, one time occasion. The service will be available only once in the interval.
editor.no_plan: You do not have an active subscription. Other users will not see your profile.
editor.trial: You are in the trial period for the next {{days}} days.
editor.name: Name
editor.slug_tooltip: Your identifier will be used in the URL of your profile page. For example: calencraft.com/profile/your-special-identifier
editor.billing_address_info: Billing address differs from home address
editor.session_from: Start time of the first session
editor.session_to: End time of the last session
editor.from_to_description: Select the hours when the service is available.
editor.date_repeat_description: Your service will be available from the selected date.
editor.length_frequency_description: The service is {{length}} minutes long, and sessions will be available every {{frequency}} minutes.
editor.session_days: Select which days the service is available.
editor.break_temporary_info: Temporary breaks are one-time occasions, like holidays, vacations, or other events.
editor.break_regular_info: Regular breaks are recurring, like coffee breaks, lunch breaks, or other regular events.
editor.break_day: Select which days the break applies.

home.welcomeText: Calencraft is a platform where you can easily manage your services, clients, and time. Set up your own services and appointments, and live your life at your own pace!
home.welcomeText2: This website was created to make scheduling as simple and seamless as possible for you. Forget the hassles – enjoy the easy and fast booking experience with us!

sections.simpleSchedulingDescription: Whatever service you offer, Calencraft helps both you and your clients manage appointments with ease.
sections.simpleSchedulingDescription2: With just a few clicks, you can book services and always stay up to date with your appointments.
sections.subscriptionsDescription: Choose from various subscription packages and enjoy the benefits of Calencraft starting at just 1,000 HUF per month.
sections.subscriptionsDescription2: Moreover, you can enjoy the benefits of the Standard subscription for 14 days from the date of your registration. Whether it's your services or your schedule, Calencraft helps you stay organized and up to date.
sections.calendarManagementDescription: Stay up to date with your bookings and schedule. Manage your services and appointments easily within the calendar.
sections.emailNotificationsDescription: Never miss an important detail! Calencraft automatically sends notifications about your bookings and appointments, keeping you informed at all times.
sections.emailNotificationsDescription2: Customize the email templates that are sent to your clients.
sections.noMoreNoShowsDescription: Easily manage your bookings and appointments, and don't worry about your clients. All important information in one place so you can stay organized.
sections.userManagementDescription: Manage your clients and their bookings in one place. Stay up-to-date with your clients' information and bookings.
sections.userManagementDescription2: Easily block clients if you encounter issues or if they behave inappropriately.
sections.help: We are here to help you!
sections.helpDescription: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you.
sections.helpDescription2: What's more, we help you with the setup your Calencraft profile. Reach out to us and we will help you get started!

subscriptions.title: Choose a Subscription!
subscriptions.trial: Trial period active. You can try out all the benefits of the Standard Subscription for free.

features.trial: You can try out the available services
features.not_available: Your profile will not be available to others

features.available: Your profile will be available to others

delete.title: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
delete.content: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? After canceling, the previous features will not be available.
delete.warning: Other users will not see your profile, and your services will not be available.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Calencraft's Privacy Policy! This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services. We take your privacy seriously and are committed to ensuring that your information is secure.
privacyPolicy.company_content: Calencraft is a cloud-based booking service connecting providers and clients. Calencraft is operated by Attila Vörös e.v., headquartered in Hungary.
privacyPolicy.providers_content: Providers are users who offer services through Calencraft. They are responsible for managing their services and communicating with clients.
privacyPolicy.clients_content: Clients are users who book services through Calencraft.
privacyPolicy.booking_content: Bookings represent agreements between providers and clients. Providers manage bookings, and clients can access them through Calencraft.
privacyPolicy.services_content: Services are offerings provided by providers, which clients can book through Calencraft.
privacyPolicy.data_collection_content: When you use Calencraft, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact information. This information is used solely for the purpose of facilitating bookings and communicating with you regarding your bookings.
privacyPolicy.no_marketing: We do not use your personal information for marketing purposes or share it with third parties without your consent.
privacyPolicy.virtual_profiles_content: If you book a session on Calencraft without being authenticated, a virtual profile may be created in our database to represent you. This virtual profile is used solely for the purpose of managing your bookings and providing you with access to our services.
privacyPolicy.payment_data_security_content: Payment data provided during the booking process is secured by Stripe's payment service. Calencraft does not store your payment information on our servers. Stripe adheres to industry standards for data security to ensure that your payment data is protected.
privacyPolicy.check_privacy_policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.google_login_content: By using the Google login service, Calencraft requests access to your Google account. The purpose of accessing your Google account is to simplify the login process and securely handle your personal information.
privacyPolicy.google_login_content_2: Access to your Google account means that during registration, your name and email address will be used to create your Calencraft account.
privacyPolicy.invoice_content: Calencraft does not store your payment details on our servers. By using the Billingo invoicing service, we securely handle your billing information, and invoices are sent to your email address.
privacyPolicy.invoice_content_2: In the Billingo system, your name, email address, and billing information are used to issue invoices.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.welcome: Welcome to Calencraft! By using our services, you accept the following terms of use and agree to comply with them. Please read the terms carefully.
termsOfService.who_can_use_provider: As a provider, any individual over the age of 18 with legal capacity, or a representative of a legal entity, can use Calencraft. Providers must register with their real information, either on their own behalf or on behalf of the represented entity.
termsOfService.who_can_use_client: As a client, any individual can use Calencraft by registering with their real information.
termsOfService.trial_period_content: Calencraft offers a free trial period to new providers. The trial lasts 14 days from registration and includes all services and features available with paid subscriptions.
termsOfService.free_subscription_content: Calencraft offers a free subscription option for providers. With this option, providers can customize their profile, but it will not be visible to others, meaning their services will not be shown.
termsOfService.subscription_fee_content: Calencraft offers various subscription plans for providers. Subscription fees are charged monthly, with different plans offering different features and services.
termsOfService.booking_services_content: Calencraft provides a platform for users to book various services from providers. By booking a service through Calencraft, you agree to the terms set by the provider.
termsOfService.user_responsibility_content: Users are responsible for providing accurate information when booking services through Calencraft. Users must also adhere to the terms set by the provider.
termsOfService.provider_responsibility_content: Providers are responsible for delivering services booked through Calencraft professionally and on time. Providers must also adhere to the terms agreed upon with the user.
termsOfService.payment_terms_content: Currently, Calencraft does not process payments for bookings. Payment for booked services may be required in advance or upon completion, depending on the provider’s policies. Users are responsible for any fees and costs associated with their bookings.
termsOfService.disclaimer_content: Calencraft does not assume responsibility for the quality or completion of services booked through the platform. Users and providers are responsible for resolving any disputes or issues that may arise during the booking process.
termsOfService.data_deletion_content: Users and providers can mark themselves as deleted users; however, data will be retained to enable the visualization of remaining and historical bookings. If a user or provider wishes to completely delete their data, they can request it via the email address listed in the Contact section. Deletion requests will be processed as promptly as possible.
termsOfService.changes_to_terms_content: Calencraft reserves the right to update or modify these terms at any time. Users and providers are responsible for periodically reviewing the terms for any changes.
termsOfService.acceptance_of_terms: By using Calencraft, you agree to abide by these terms of use. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
termsOfService.contact_us: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us.
